title: Documentation
description: This is the documentation of our suggested legislation.

body.raw:
The Blockchain Regulation Matrix is in two parts, Centralized and Decentralized. On the left you can scroll through each topic, though they will align with the of topics according to the Blockchain Regulation Matrix. This is an example of a doc site built using [ContentLayer](/docs/documentation/contentlayer) and MDX. This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page, it means we're still working on it. You can follow updates on Twitter [@cryptopolicydao](https://twitter.com/cryptopolicydao). ## Features Select a feature below to learn more about it.
### Documentation This documentation site built using Contentlayer. ### Marketing The marketing site with landing pages. ### App The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### Blog The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
